readme:
# frontend

React + TypeScript UI using mocks from common & backend.

## Folders

- `public/`: static assets  
- `src/`: source code  
  - `components/`: React components (e.g. `BiasIndicator.tsx`)
  - `styles/`: global and component CSS/SCSS  
  - `mockResponses/`: JSON mocks imported from `backend` for offline dev  
  - `App.tsx`, `index.tsx`, etc.

## Getting Started

```bash
npm install
npm start
